name: SpaceTime Manipulator
description:
Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2

You're gifted with the powers to bend reality as we know it. Press z to enter the matrix where for 5 seconds only you can move and do what you please. After that you are sent back to your original location. 

And with these powers you decide it's only natural to steal a giant emerald worth millions.

Made by: BojoEnderGame
